Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to notice requirements and municipal cooperation in wireless facility siting
Summary: Relates to notice requirements and municipal cooperation in wireless facility siting; requires notification be provided to municipalities in which wireless facilities are to be sited and to residents within two thousand five hundred feet of proposed wireless facilities.
LawCode: Add ยง119-d, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to notice requirements and municipal cooperation in wireless facility siting
